metadata.title: CVE-2019-0161 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Stack overflow in XHCI for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
ovmf-ia32 - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
qemu-efi - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1').
